item.title: Kubernetes + EKS + Docker + Node
item.description: Creation of a **web application** to convert images to black and white. **3 microservices** orchestrated by **Docker-Compose locally** and by **Kubernetes on AWS**.

item.title: Github Actions + Hugo + Terraform + S3
item.description: Creation of a static website with **Hugo**. Host it on **S3** with **CloudFront**. Use **Terraform** and **Github actions** to deploy it in a **GitOps** way.

item.title: Step Functions + Rekognition
item.description: Detect **faces** in images with **Rekognition**. Create a face **collection** to find **similar faces**.

item.title: S3 Event Notification + Rekognition + ImageMagick
item.description: Detect **Bird**, **Cat** and **Dog** in images with **Rekognition** then draw the bounding box with **ImageMagick**.

item.title: Terraform + S3 + S3 Event Notification + Lambda
item.description: Terraforming **S3** and **S3 Event Notification** to change object ACL with **Lambda**.
